# Requirements for OpenSlides in production in alphabetical order

reportlab>=3.0,<3.4
roman>=2.0,<2.1
setuptools>=2.2,<21.0
sockjs-tornado>=1.0.1,<1.1
Whoosh>=2.7.0,<2.8
